resources.timeSwitchImageHelpText: Time for the banner transition. Default: 4 seconds.
resources.boolLoopCarouselHelpText: Loop the carousel infinitly. Default: false.
resources.boolAutoplayCarouselHelpText: Automactly autoplay the carousel when the page loads. Default: true.
resources.mobileImageUrl1HelpText: Upload the mobile version of this image
resources.bannerLink1HelpText: Define, if necessary, a link to redirect the page
resources.startDate1HelpText: Define, if necessary, a date to start showing this image. Pattern: YYYYMMDD
resources.endDate1HelpText: Define, if necessary, a date to stop showing this image. Pattern: YYYYMMDD
resources.bannerText1HelpText: Show a simple text on the image
